channel.title: Economic Strength on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Economic Strength on FinanClub

item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:11 Chances: Itaú Unibanco Holding S.A. benefits from steady growth in asset management and credit operations. The recent distribution of interest on capital to stockholders shows a commitment to rewarding investors. The economy remains strong, according to Federal Reserve Chairman, Jerome Powell, which bodes well for financial institutions like Itaú Unibanco Holding S.

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:225 Chances: In the closing of the recent trading day, Medical Properties (MPW) stood at $4.19, denoting a +0.24% change from the preceding trading day. As Q1 winds to a close and the economy strengthens, it is time to look at three top-performing dividend stocks.
